title: RBI imposes penalties on Housing and Urban Development Corporation, 2 others
description: The Reserve Bank of India has imposed penalties on three entities, including Housing and Urban Development Corporation Ltd, for non-compliance with specific regulatory provisions. Housing and Urban Development Corporation Ltd faces a penalty of Rs 3.5 lakh, while Godrej Housing and Aadhar Housing Finance Ltd have been fined Rs 5 lakh each.
